description: This file defines the implementation of the DownloadManagerHttpClient class, which manages downloading files over HTTP using the libcurl library. It includes methods for initializing the HTTP client, performing downloads with rate limiting, progress tracking, and handling cleanup.

classes.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient
classes.description: A class that handles HTTP file downloads using libcurl, supporting progress reporting, rate limiting, and cancellation.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the curl handle and members.

methods.name: ~DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the curl handle.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP download of a file from a specified URL to a local filename with optional rate limiting.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Callback for curl to report download progress, updates internal progress state, and supports cancellation.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Callback for libcurl to write downloaded data to a file.

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t DownloadManagerHttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ult/
